data.name: About_AboutDesc
data.value: Take notes, sync notes from different sources.

data.name: MainView_Welcome
data.value: Welcome to Mindbank. To create or import new notes, click on the "+" To continue working on notes, click on the note name.

data.name: MainView_DeleteBank
data.value: Do you really want to delete this bank?

data.name: Settings_KeepText
data.value: Keep text and selected tags after creating a ote

data.name: MainView_CanntoLoad_VersionMismatch
data.value: Cannot load or import this bank(s)/note(s). Version %v% is not supported in this version of Mindbank.

data.name: Update_2
data.value: These updates may feature new additions such as newer features. These updates may also feature critical changes to make the application secure.

data.name: Update_3
data.value: It is always advised to use the latest version of this application.

data.name: ToolTip_UpdatesAvailable
data.value: You have updates available for this app. Click/touch this button to update.

data.name: ToolTip_CheckingForUpdates
data.value: Please wait while we are checking for updates...

data.name: ToolTip_UpToDate
data.value: Your software is up to date. Press/touch this button to perform an update checking.

data.name: ToolTip_Settings
data.value: Click/touch here to go to Settings.

data.name: ToolTip_About
data.value: Click/touch here to see Abouts page.

data.name: ToolTip_NewNoteGroup
data.value: Banks are groups of notes. Click/touch here to create a new bank.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_EditName
data.value: Click/touch here to toggle the ability to change the name of this bank.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_SelectItemsExit
data.value: Click/touch to exit out of selection mode.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_RemoveSelected
data.value: Click/touch this button to remove all selected notes.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_ExportSelected
data.value: Click/touch here to export the selected notes.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_InvertSelection
data.value: Click/touch here to select the unselected items and unselect the selected items.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_RandomButton
data.value: Click/touch to show/hide the random picker panel.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_RandomPick
data.value: Click/touch to decide only to show the random picked note or all.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_SearchButton
data.value: Click/touch to show/hide the search panel.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_SearchUseRegex
data.value: Click/touch to toggle regular expression mode.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_SearchCaseSensitive
data.value: Click/touch to toggle case sensitivity mode.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_EditNoteOn
data.value: Click/touch here to stop editing the note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_EditNoteOff
data.value: Click/touch here to edit this note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_TagOn
data.value: Click/touch here to remove this tag from this note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_TagOff
data.value: Click/touch here to add this tag to this note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_Send
data.value: Click/touch to add the new note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_PowerMode
data.value: Power Mode: Text and tags stay after adding a new note. Click/touch this button to toggle it.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_PreviewOn
data.value: Click/touch this to disable the preview.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_PreviewOff
data.value: Click/touch this to enable the preview.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_NewItemTagButton
data.value: Click/touch here to toggle show/hide the tags panel for the new note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_NewItemTagOn
data.value: Click/touch here to remove this tag from the new note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_NewItemTagOff
data.value: Click/touch here to add this tag to the new note.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_NewItemNewTag
data.value: Click/touch here to make a new tag.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_NewItemTagColor
data.value: This determines the color of the tag.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_NewItemTagColorRandom
data.value: Click/touch here to assign a random color ofr this tag.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_NewItemTagAdd
data.value: Click/touch here to add this tag.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_TagMenuButton
data.value: Click/touch to show/hide the tags panel.

data.name: ToolTip_Note_TagMenuTagOff
data.value: Click/touch to only show notes with this tag.
